name: Pacific Foods Organic Vegetable Lentil Soup, Plant Based, 16.3 oz Can
short_description: One (1) 16.3 oz can of Pacific Foods Organic Vegetable Lentil Soup
Made with tender lentils, black beans, fire-roasted red peppers and vine-ripened tomatoes for a delicious vegetarian soup
USDA Certified Organic vegan soup with non-GMO ingredients and no artificial colors or no added flavors
Canned soup contains 14 grams of protein per can and is a good source of fiber* *See nutrition facts for sodium content
This plant based vegetarian soup can be microwaved on high for 3 minutes in a covered bowl or a saucepan over medium heat on the stove
product_description: Immerse your taste buds into something truly unique with Pacific Foods Organic Vegetable Lentil Soup. This organic soup has the rich flavor of lentils and black beans. Fire-roasted red peppers and vine-ripened tomatoes round out the flavor of this plant based soup. Enjoy it on its own as a quick and easy snack, customize it with your favorite toppings or pair soups with a salad, sandwich or wrap. USDA Certified Organic and made with non-GMO ingredients, this vegetable soup contains 14 grams of protein per can, is a good source of fiber* and is made with no MSG, high fructose corn syrup, artificial colors or artificial flavors added. Each 16.3-ounce recyclable can contains one serving. To prepare, pour into a saucepan or microwave-safe bowl, heat until hot, stir and enjoy. Microwave on high for 3 minutes and let stand for 1 minute. Every spoonful of our vegan soup is satisfying to the last drop. In addition to our Vegetable Lentil soup, we offer Chicken Noodle, Chicken and Wild Rice and more. At Pacific Foods, we're dedicated to making the most nourishing foods possible from carefully sourced ingredients. *See nutrition facts for sodium content

name: Bear Creek Soup Mix, Cheddar Potato, 11.5 Ounce
short_description: This favorite Bear Creek soup tastes like it simmered for hours not minutes.
This rich Bear Creek soup tastes like you made it from scratch with a great cheese flavor and hearty potatoes.
Try adding crumbled bacon, sour cream and shredded cheddar cheese for variety.
Easy to prepare mix, just add water.
Bring home a little comfort
product_description: This rich Bear Creek soup tastes like you made it from scratch with a great cheese flavor and hearty potatoes, all seasoned perfectly with parsley, herbs and spices. Try adding crumbled bacon, sour cream and shredded cheddar cheese for variety. Yields about 8 one-cup servings. Warm up a slow cooker full tonight. Makes 8 servings or 1/2 gallon. Just add water! In a few simple steps, you can serve "homemade" soups that will satisfy every appetite in 15 minutes. High in the Heber Valley of the Wasatch Mountains, Bear Creek Country Kitchens began with one goal in mind: Deliver great hearty homestyle dishes that the whole family will enjoy. Combining high quality hearty ingredients with our special blend of spices, our soups are delicious, yet easy to prepare. In just minutes you can serve "homemade" soups that will satisfy every appetite.

name: Campbell's Condensed Garlic Parmesan Cheese Soup With Herbs, 10.5 oz Can
short_description: Campbell's Garlic Parmesan Cheese Soup With Herbs is a rich and creamy soup
This delicious canned soup is crafted with parmesan cheese, garlic, basil, and oregano for rich, cheesy flavor
Use this soup as a versatile ingredient in recipes like 30-min lemon garlic parmesan & herb shrimp pasta
Each can is recipe-ready, offering a variety of uses across multiple dishes
A pantry staple that offers a quick and easy way to enhance recipes with cheesy texture and rich flavor
product_description: Comfort starts in the kitchen, and Campbell’s Garlic Parmesan Cheese Soup With Herbs helps you create dishes that bring people together by transforming simple recipes into unforgettable meals. Use it to create easy meals like 30-min lemon garlic parmesan & herb shrimp pasta, as a soup starter for creamy and cheesy one-pot creations, or to make your own garlic parmesan cheese dip. Whatever you're making, this pantry staple is ready to inspire. This soup is made with parmesan cheese, garlic, basil, and oregano for rich, cheesy flavor. Its smooth texture and savory taste make it perfect for quick scratch cooking or adding depth to everyday recipes. From hearty dishes to quick comfort food moments, Campbell’s Condensed Garlic Parmesan Cheese Soup With Herbs adds warmth and satisfaction to every bite. Stock up on Campbell's canned soup to always be ready for your next kitchen creation. Whether it’s a chilly afternoon or a moment to share, this condensed soup makes every bite feel a little more fun and comforting. With Campbell’s, there’s always a good excuse to cook for loved ones or treat yourself to tasty flavor that brings a little extra joy to the table.

name: Campbell’s Chunky Soup, Beef Soup with Country Vegetables, 18.8 Oz Can
short_description: Campbell's Chunky Soup: 18.8 oz can of Campbell’s Chunky Beef Soup with Country Vegetables
Big Flavors: Vegetable beef soup with big chunks of beef and hearty veggies like carrots, celery, peas and potatoes in beef broth
15 grams of Protein: Hearty soup that has vegetables and 15 grams of protein in each can
Pantry Staple: Enjoy this soup at home or at work as part of a delicious, filling lunch, or take on outdoor adventures to eat by the campfire
Microwavable Soup: This easy to microwave soup is simple to prepare, just heat in a microwave-safe bowl and serve as an appetizer or main dish
product_description: Campbell’s Chunky Beef Soup with Country Vegetables isn’t just tasty—it's made to work as hard as you do. With never-ending big flavors and bold ingredients, this canned soup is capable of fueling even the heartiest appetite. This ready-to-eat beef vegetable soup is crafted with big chunks of beef and hearty veggies like carrots, celery, peas and potatoes to create a big-flavored recipe that satisfies and fills you up. Each can has 15 grams of protein. It Fills You Up Right. Just pop this ready-to-serve soup in a microwave-safe bowl, heat and enjoy with your favorite sides. Or, warm it over the campfire on your outdoor adventures. Whether you’re looking for quick and easy to microwave soup for home or something to take on the go, Campbell’s has you covered. The soup can is recyclable for easy disposal. Take on the great outdoors with Campbell’s Chunky Beef Soup With Country Vegetables—Soup That Eats Like a Meal. In addition to Beef Soup with Country Vegetables, Campbell's Chunky Soup is also available in Beef and Barley, Sirloin Burger and more.

name: Pacific Foods Organic Potato Vegetable Curry Soup, 16.3 Ounce
short_description: No hydrogenated fats or high fructose corn syrup allowed in any food
No bleached or bromated flour
No synthetic nitrates or nitrites
product_description: Immerse your taste buds into something truly unique with Pacific Foods Organic Curry Potato and Vegetable Soup. Inspired by the robust flavors of classic Indian food, this USDA Organic soup is consciously crafted with non-GMO ingredients, including potatoes, onions, tomatoes, carrots, and other veggies. Bold curry spices add a vibrant warmth that’s perfectly balanced by a touch of sweetness from creamy coconut milk, creating a rich and flavorful potato soup with a distinctly complex, comforting taste. With no added sugars* and no high fructose corn syrup, this plant-based, vegan soup makes it easy to be intentional about the way you stock your pantry. Enjoy the gluten free soup on its own as a quick and easy snack, customize it with your favorite toppings, or pair it with a salad, sandwich, or wrap. To prepare the canned soup, simply microwave on high for 2.5 to 3 minutes, or heat in a saucepan on the stove, stirring occasionally. Each 16.3 oz recyclable can contains two cups of microwave soup. In addition to Organic Curry Potato and Vegetable Soup, Pacific Foods offers Hearty Vegetable, Tomato Bisque, and more. (*Not a low calorie food. See nutrition facts for calorie and sugar content.)

name: Campbell's Classic Ready to Serve Vegetable Soup, 7.25 Oz, Pack of 24
short_description: Foodservice Item: A flavorful recipe of crisp carrots, hearty potatoes, sweet corn, peas, and al dente macaroni in a savory tomato and beef base.
Simple To Serve: No need to worry about multi-step prep; the simple, easy-to-open single serving can doesn’t need to be reconstituted. Just heat, stir, and serve.
An Easy Staple: This is the perfect on-the-go meal option delighting guests wherever they are.

Menu Inspiration: Great for a snack in between meals. List this savory soup on your appetizer menu or feature as a lunch special with a seasonal salad. Add a small cup as a side with a burger or a chicken sandwich instead of fries or chips.

Nutrition Matters: Each serving of Vegetable soup is low in calories, carbohydrates, and fat, and has a full serving of vegetables, making it a wholesome option you can feel good about serving to your customers.
product_description: At Campbell's Foodservice, we want your stores and vending machines stocked with carefully crafted foods, so you can deliver healthy, convenient foods to your customers. Our extensive line of soups are crafted with carefully selected ingredients with options rich in protein, fiber, and vitamins. Our Campbell's Classic Shelf Stable Soups contain no high-fructose corn syrup, no added MSG, no colors from artificial sources, no artificial flavors, no added preservatives, and are never in BPA-lined cans. The shelf-stable packaging makes it a great offering as a wholesome, on-the-go meal or snack. Wherever you offer our ready-to-serve soups, our soups are made for your guests. And we're Made to Serve.

name: Progresso Vegetable Soup, Vegetable Classics Canned Soup, 19 oz
short_description: VEGETABLE CLASSICS: Progresso Vegetable Soup with veggies and rotini pasta
DELICIOUS FOOD: Made with one-half cup vegetables per serving
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Contains no artificial flavors or colors from artificial sources
QUICK-AND-EASY: Ready to serve in under 5 minutes; about 2 servings per container
CONTAINS: One 19 ounce can of Progresso Vegetable Classics Vegetable Soup
product_description: Have your veggies and enjoy them, too, with Progresso Vegetable Classics Vegetable Soup. This canned vegetable soup adds a twist for extra substance: rotini pasta. Enjoy delicious ingredients like carrots, celery, green beans, tomato, and more. Made with one-half cup of vegetables per serving, this soup contains no artificial flavors, no colors from artificial sources and no added MSG. Unlike instant ramen, Progresso soup is ready to serve, no need to add water. Serve a bowl or cup of Progresso Vegetable Soup alongside a warm grilled cheese sandwich or freshly baked bread. To prepare instant soup on the stovetop, simply heat in a saucepan. For microwavable soup, heat in a microwave-safe bowl for 2-4 minutes on high. Let soup sit for 1 minute before removing from the microwave. Handle with care, stir, eat and enjoy! At Progresso, we’re passionate about making great products. We've been creating soups ranging from Chicken Noodle to Beef & Vegetable and beyond for more than 100 years. And today, Progresso still uses quality ingredients for a tasteful flavor found only in our line of canned soup products.
